Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, as it represents years of dedication and innovation. I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000, and I am confident we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure you receive a high-quality product while allowing me to maintain a fair return on my investment. I believe this price strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties involved.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
